DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether specific nutrient supplementation improve dynamic stability old adult .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate effect single nutrient dietary supplement dynamic stability old population . Dynamic stability , walk stability , assess accelerometer subject walk flat surface 60 second . Dynamic stability define maximum Lyapunov exponent ( maxLE ) , Floquet multiplier , motor control timing , change baseline . Postural stability also measure still stand subject , foot placement standardize force plate , subject look forward direction arm side . Two visual condition give : eyes-open ( EO ) eyes-closed ( EC ) . Each measurement last 60 second repeat twice condition . A three-minute rest provide measurement .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject voluntarily sign date informed consent form ( ICF ) , approve Independent Ethics Committee ( IEC ) /Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) , provide Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) ( applicable privacy regulation ) authorization prior participation study . 2 . Subject male female ≥ 65 ≤ 85 year age . 3 . Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 20 ≤ 32 kg/m2 . 4 . Subject ambulatory able walk ≥ 25 meter without use assistive device . 5 . Subject serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level ≥ 7.5 ≤ 22.5 ng/ml ( 18.75 56.25 nmol/L ) screening . 6 . Subject agree apply sunscreen ( ≥ SPF 30 ) expose skin , expect increase exposure sunlight ( e.g . plan holiday eight day , beach holiday holiday southern hemisphere , duration study ) . 7 . Subject agree use tan bed duration study . 8 . Subject agree refrain start new exercise program , weight loss program , duration study . 9 . Subject able follow protocol . 1 . Subject state regularly consume supplemental vitamin D amount great agespecific Institute Of Medicine daily recommend dietary allowance ( 600 IU 15 µg subject ≥ 65 ≤ 70 year age ; 800 IU 20 µg subject > 70 year age ) . Supplemental vitamin D include standalone vitamin D supplement , vitamin D supplement calcium , multivitamin , medication contain vitamin D , purposefully seek sunlight outdoors . 2 . Subject state receive vitamin D3 injection within last 3 month . 3 . Subject miss , amputation , limb . 4 . For subject report > 2 fall within last year , one fall within last year injury , study physician study PI must approve participation study . 5 . Subject state abnormality obstruction gastrointestinal tract preclude swallowing ( e.g . dysphagia ) digestion ( e.g. , know intestinal malabsorption , celiac disease , inflammatory bowel disease , chronic pancreatitis , steatorrhea ) . 6 . Subject state sarcoidosis , lymphoma , primary hyperparathyroidism , disease may enhance serum calcium concentration , determine study physician . 7 . Subject state kidney stone within last 3 year . 8 . Subject state abnormal index calcium metabolism include hypercalcemia . 9 . Subject state granulomatous disease sarcoidosis , active chronic tuberculosis , Wegener 's granulomatosis . 10 . Subject state diagnose renal failure , renal insufficiency , chronic kidney disease , receive hemodialysis . 11 . Subject state active malignant disease , except basal squamous cell skin carcinoma carcinoma situ uterine cervix . 12 . Subject state liver failure ( decompensated chronic liver disease ) . 13 . Subject state history significant cardiovascular event ( e.g. , myocardial infarction , heart failure , stroke ) ≤ 3 month prior screen visit . 14 . Subject state currently diagnose , history severe dementia delirium , eat disorder , history significant neurological psychiatric disorder , alcoholism , substance abuse condition may interfere study dietary supplement consumption compliance study protocol procedure opinion principal investigator study physician . 15 . Subject report undergone major surgery , less 6 week prior enrollment study , subject plan inpatient surgery require 2 day hospitalization entire study . 16 . Subject state undergone hip replacement surgery within last year . 17 . Subject state currently prescribe ( primary care physician health professional ) medication opinion study physician effect serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level ( e.g. , certain anticonvulsant , phenobarbital , carbamazepine , phenytoin ) . 18 . Subject state undergo treatment within last 2 year epilepsy , treatment effect serum 25hydroxyvitamin D. 19 . Subject state prescribe within last 2 year bisphosphonates parathyroid hormone . 20 . Subject state refrain anabolic hormone growth hormone , start screen entire course study . 21 . Subject report alcohol intake average 3 serving per day ( serve define 4 oz wine , 12 oz beer , 1 oz spirit ) . 22 . Subject state allergy intolerance ingredient study product . 23 . Subject deem unsuitable study base upon study physician assessment . 24 . Subject take part another clinical trial . 25 . The use fat absorption inhibiting product ( e.g. , prescription orlistat ( Xenical ) , counter orlistat ( Alli ) ) study .
